channel.title: How can i change my background on my client?
channel.description:
hello i need help
i want to change the backgriund of my server but i dont know how plz help
thnx maker of zipposcape

item.title: How can i change my background on my client?
item.dc:creator: @dancey88 dancey88
item.description:
@dancey88 wrote:

its in your models or sprites or something in client files look for the image of your background and right click on it click edit and put a diffrent picture in it has to be the correct size though.

Read full topic
